scripts.test:prepare: npm run log:clean:runs ; npm run report:clean
scripts.test:run: npm run test:prepare ; cross-env TEST_ENV=$env playwright test
scripts.test:run:oneworker: npm run test:prepare ; cross-env TEST_ENV=$env playwright test --workers=1
scripts.test:run:firefox: npm run test:prepare ; cross-env TEST_ENV=$env playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:run:chrome: npm run test:prepare ; cross-env TEST_ENV=$env playwright test --project=chrome
scripts.test:run:edge: npm run test:prepare ; cross-env TEST_ENV=$env playwright test --project=edge
